root.name: Land of the Dead - Day of Reckoning
root.description: Land of the dead-Day of reckoning is a side scroll game based on the movie Land of the dead. It is available for the Nokia N80, E70, E60 mobile phone. In the game you play as the character Riley. As one of the last survivors you live in a walled city and your job is to leave the city and get food medicine from the suburbs.
